text:
Private certificates
help keep your business

secure, but operating your own
private certificate authority

AWS Private Certificate
Authority simplifies setting

up a secure, highly available,
private CA that helps protect

and identify your internal
servers, containers,

Using your preferred language
SDK, you can access proven

and well-documented APIs to efficiently
automate the large-scale

AWS services, such as Amazon
Elastic Kubernetes Service

and AWS Certificate Manager,
can use these private certificates

You can install certificates
issued by your private CA on either

AWS resources or on your own
private network outside of AWS,

Avoid outages, improve uptime,
and help meet your security

and compliance requirements
today with AWS Private Certificate
